quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Australia and City
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, college, shows. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Which Australian city would you be in if you saw the Yarra River?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Melbourne

questions.question: What did WWF wrestler The Rock major in college?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Criminology

questions.question: What is the capital city of Australia?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Canberra

questions.question: This giant Australian state takes up a third of Australias area.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Western Australia

questions.question: What is the name of the foundation professional wrestler The Rock started in 2006?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Dwayne Johnson Rock Foundation

questions.question: Which Australian state or territory would you be in if you visited Ayres Rock?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Northern Territory

questions.question: Which Australian city was wiped out by tropical cyclone Tracey in 1974?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Darwin

questions.question: Mark Ruffalo spent his teen years in Virginia Beach, Virginia.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: What is Mark Ruffalos full name?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Mark Alan Ruffalo

questions.question: What year did Australia go through a constitutional crisis?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 1975

questions.question: Name the Australian Prime Minister who was dismissed by Governor General Sir John Kerr?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Gough Whitlam

questions.question: Which one of the following shows did wrestler The Rock not appear in?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 8 Simple Rules

questions.question: In 1983 Australia defeated America for the first time in this international sporting event.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Americas Cup

questions.question: This Australian city is a popular tourist destination which has a bridge nicknamed The Coat Hanger and an opera house that looks like egg shells.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Sydney

questions.question: Most Australians live in coastal areas.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Mark Ruffalo and Comedian

questions.question: Which late comedian does the following quote belong to: I am a comedian and poet, so anything that doesnt get a laugh … is a poem.?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Bill Hicks

questions.question: Has Mark Ruffalo ever been nominated for a Tony Award?

questions.question: Which of these movies has Mark Ruffalo not appeared in?

questions.question: What is the unusual name of Mark Ruffalos wife?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Sunrise

questions.question: This Scottish actor began his career as a boilermaker, and later switched to folk singing, before he found his true calling as a comedian.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Billy Connolly

questions.question: Mark Ruffalo starred in the 2007 film Zodiac.

questions.question: This English stand-up comedians trademark is cross-dressing, on and off stage.

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Judd Hirsch and Joaquin Phoenix
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, stars, sitcom. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: For which two plays has Judd Hirsch won Tony Awards for Best Actor in a Drama?

options.text: The Ladder and A Night in Calabrese
Im Not Rappaport and Conversations with My Father

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Im Not Rappaport and Conversations with My Father

questions.question: Which comedy legend said When another comedian has a lousy show, Im the first one to admit it?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Jack Benny

questions.question: Jude Hirsch stars as the father of a math genius and of an FBI officer in this CBS series.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Numb3rs

questions.question: Where was actor/director/writer/producer Peter Riegert born?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: New York City, NY

questions.question: Joaquin Phoenix is known to have been a vegan since the age of three.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: Who co-starred in We Own the Night with Joaquin Phoenix?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: All of these

questions.question: Which of the following movies did Joaquin Phoenix not appear in?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Backdraft

questions.question: Joaquin Phoenix won a Grammy Award for his work on the album Walk the Line.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: What 2003 animated Disney film did Joaquin Phoenix lend his voice to?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Brother Bear

questions.question: What role did Judd Hirsch play in the 2001 movie A Beautiful Mind?

options.text: He played a spy who existed in John Nashs mind.
He played a high ranking member of Princetons math department.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: He played a high ranking member of Princetons math department.

questions.question: What was the name of this 1988 comedy movie that starred Peter Riegert as a pickle salesman who was set up by a professional matchmaker on the lower Eastside of New York City.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Crossing Delancey

questions.question: In what show did Judd Hirsch voice a man who was building a nuclear bomb for the Keebler elves?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Family Guy

questions.question: From 1988-1992 Judd Hirsch starred in this NBC sitcom about a divorced English teacher.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Dear John

questions.question: Judd Hirsch was born  in 1935. Where was he born?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Bronx, New York

questions.question: This American ventriloquist and stand-up comedian is best known for acts, which include puppets, such as Achmed, the Dead Terrorist.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Jeff Dunham

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Mike Myers and Movie
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, myers, kind. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Which statement is untrue about Peter Riegert?

options.text: He is a former eighth-grade teacher.
In his first show business role he portrayed Chico Marx.
He was nominated for a Tony Award for his role in Chicago.
He lived with Bette Midler during the 1970s.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: He was nominated for a Tony Award for his role in Chicago.

questions.question: What is the name of Mike Myers character in the 2008 comedy movie The Love Guru?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Guru Maurice Pitka

questions.question: What actress starred as Anita Randazzo in the 1998 movie 54, also featuring Mike Myers?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Salma Hayek

questions.question: What character did Mike Myers portray in the 2003 comedy movie The Cat in the Hat?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Cat

questions.question: Why was Mike Myers cast as General Ed Fenech in the 2009 movie Inglourious Basterds?

options.text: He was a fan of director Quentin Tarantino.
His parents were in the British Armed Forces.
He had inquired about making an appearance in the movie.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: All of these

questions.question: What female singer and actress starred alongside Mike Myers in the 2002 comedy movie Austin Powers in Goldmember?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Beyonce Knowles

questions.question: What role did Peter Riegert play in the TV comedy series Seinfeld?

options.text: Franklin Delano Rockafeller, the man who wishes Kramer dead
Cassidy, the man who installs illegal cable TV
Kimbrough, the man who finally approves Jerrys sitcom
Joe Manchetti, Kramers friend who makes bootleg tapes

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Kimbrough, the man who finally approves Jerrys sitcom

questions.question: Peter Riegert plays the crude detective Lt. Kellaway in this 1994 comedy.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Mask

questions.question: What actress starred as Felicity Shagwell alongside Mike Myers in the 1999 comedy movie Austin Powers: The Spy Who Shagged Me?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Heather Graham

questions.question: What happens to Shrek in the 2007 animated comedy Shrek the Third?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: He becomes a father.

questions.question: What character made their debut in the 2004 movie Shrek 2, featuring the voices of Mike Myers, Eddie Murphy and Cameron Diaz?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Puss in Boots

questions.question: What kind of creature is Shrek, voiced by Mike Myers in the 2001 computer-animated comedy movie Shrek?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Ogre

questions.question: In 2001 Peter Riegert was nominated for an Oscar for his short movie By Courier. He directed it, produced it  and wrote the film adaptation. Who wrote the original story?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: O. Henry

questions.question: Scenes in the 1997 movie Austin Powers: International Man of Mystery were inspired by what James Bond movie?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: All of these

questions.question: In 2004 Peter Riegert directed, starred in, produced and wrote the adaptation for the movie King of the Corner. It starred Eli Wallach, Dominic Chianese, Peter Friedman, Rita Moreno, Harris Yullin and this star of Law and Order: Criminal Intent.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Eric Bogosian
